extendedInfo.description: ClickerSchool Virtual Clicker is an interactive response system used by instructors in classrooms or meetings for polling audiences with mobile devices. Enjoy a modern world experience by connecting using iPads, iPhones, iPod Touches, smart phones, laptops, or any web-enabled device. This is your low-cost solution with no need to purchase and install software, response devices, and receivers - only an Internet connection! Features:âOver 180,000 questions available, or the power to create your ownâ52 subject libraries (Grades 3-12, including AP subjects)âAnswers available in multiple choice, true/false, or free responseâInstant reports give immediate feedbackâEasy to use gradebook includes item analysis and category reporting âTeachers can email results to studentsâUnlimited connections to support large groups/classroomsâDevices can connect via WiFi or 3G.âStudents can participate with any Internet-enabled deviceâChat feature allows instant communication between the presenter and participants âQuick Poll Activity: No setup required!Activities/Games:âLive Poll: Live Polling offers instant feedback and analysis on screen. âEduRace: Dynamic animated visuals and light hearted competition with high speed racing. âTug of War: Build teamwork with Tug Of War, a must-have classroom experience.âHard Copy Testing: Students receive on-screen feedback for answered, flagged, and current questions.ClickerSchool Virtual Clicker is a free Application to accompany ClickerSchool.com. A subscription for ClickerSchool.com is required and available for as low as $0.99 per student/semester. To get started, register for an account at www.ClickerSchool.com. Eduware Inc. was founded in 1994 by Bill Stevens, a teacher of High School Biology, Chemistry, and Physics. Bill envisioned a software company that would be fueled by teachers for teachers. For more information on Eduware and their products, visit http://www.eduware.com/.
